content: two patterns in one 1 multi-color instructions 2 solid color instructions the instructions are slightly different involving color changes the solid color version only has two 2 ends to weave in with no cutting yarn until you are completely done the multi-color version indicates your color changes for the intermediate crocheter uses single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet dtr and popcorn stitches don t be afraid of the popcorn and dtr - they work up into a beautiful pattern come join me at my ravelry group 1 where we test patterns host cals and swaps 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/melinda-miller-designs
